bgDescription: Shuyun's ancestral secret herbal tea, most suitable for summer. But the taste is special, and the taste is polarized. The formula is never disclosed, and it is hard to buy. Usually, you can only ask Shuyun to make it.
description: Increases all team members' ATK by 12% and Crit. Rate by 10%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases all team members' ATK by 12% and Crit. Rate by 10%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
